sentences: Kes on turniiril meie järgmine vastane?
context: The Estonian word 'vastane' has multiple meanings depending on context. It can refer to an opponent or adversary in various situations - politically, competitively (in games/sports), or militarily as an enemy. As an adjective, it means something that is against, opposed to, or resistant to something else. Examples include political opponents ('demokraatia pooldajad ja vastased' - supporters and opponents of democracy), competitors in sports/turnaments, or enemies in wartime.
